title: Mirror creation fails if `=` or `?` characters are in a patch url
body:
From https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22393#discussion_r616222128
> To reiterate, having an active mirror that does not have the patch, but does have the package directory in the local mirror, and the patch source has ? and = characters, causes the patch stage to fail.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack mirror list
local           file:///opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror
spack-public    https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/

$ spack mirror --destroy --mirror-name local
$ spack mirror create --directory /opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror/ ghostscript                             
==> Adding package ghostscript@9.50 to mirror
==> Fetching file:///opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror/ghostscript/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b-254532a

==> Fetching file:///opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror/ghostscript/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b-254532a

==> Fetching file:///opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror/ghostscript/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b-254532a

==> Warning: Error while fetching ghostscript@9.50
  [Errno 2] No such file or directory: '/tmp/gpjohnsn/spack-stage/spack-stage-0dvv_qm3/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b.part' -> '/tmp/gpjohnsn/spack-stage/spack-stage-0dvv_qm3/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b'
==> Successfully updated mirror in file:///opt/packages/gpjohnsn/argon_mirror
  Archive stats:
    1    already present
    0    added
    1    failed to fetch.
==> Error: Failed downloads:
ghostscript@9.50
```
Removing the local mirror makes everything work:
```console
$ spack mirror rm local
==> Removed mirror local.

$ spack patch ghostscript
==> Using cached archive: /opt/packages/gpjohnsn/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/0f/0f53e89fd647815828fc5171613e860e8535b68f7afbc91bf89aee886769ce89.tar.gz
==> Fetching https://git.ghostscript.com/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b
######################################################################## 100.0%
==> Applied patch https://git.ghostscript.com/?p=ghostpdl.git;a=commitdiff_plain;h=41ef9a0bc36b
==> Ran patch() for ghostscript
```

### Information on your system

Not relevant, see https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/22393#discussion_r616222128 for details

### Additional information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output
